privacy_content.title: Privacy Policy
privacy_content.section1_text: When you sign in with Google, we collect your Email, display name, and avatar URL. We store your learning records, points transactions, and subscriptions.
privacy_content.section2_text: Data is used solely to provide personalized learning services (such as SRS scheduling) and synchronize your progress across devices.
privacy_content.section3_text: This service uses Google Firebase for data storage. Your data is protected by Google's security infrastructure. We do not sell your personal data to third parties.
privacy_content.section4_text: This service uses Cookies and LocalStorage to maintain login status and preferences.
privacy_content.section5_text: You can request the deletion of your account and all related data at any time.

terms_content.title: Terms of Service
terms_content.desc: Please read before using the service.
terms_content.section1_text: Welcome to Nous Slate. By using this service, you agree to these Terms of Service.
terms_content.section2_text: We provide language learning, spaced repetition practice, and deck creation/sharing features. We reserve the right to modify or terminate the service.
terms_content.section3_text: You agree to sign in using a Google account. You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account.
terms_content.section4_text: Decks you set to 'Public' are considered authorized by you for non-commercial learning use by this platform and other users.
terms_content.section5_text: This service is provided 'as is'. We are not liable for any direct or indirect damages arising from the use of this service.
